comments.html: Do you think you can post all the blog text to RSS and Kindle?  It sounds ridiculous but have to hit the Read More... link in kindle and android isn't a good user experience.   Thanks.
comments.name: jacob

comments.html: Very nice logo and apt choice of name
comments.name: Doriano Maranzana

comments.html:
I like the new domain choice.

The only small detail that could be better, but I guess it would not work with the logo, would be to keep IP in uppercase.

Anyway details, the content is what really matters ;)
comments.name: Rodrigo

comments.html:
Putting the full text in the RSS feed hurts pageviews that don't reach the original site, therefore most bloggers, that care about pageviews, only put a snippet of the entire post.

If you use a feed aggregator, yes it would be great to have all the information right there, but if you are really interested in the post content you will click the 'more' link.
comments.name: Rodrigo

comments.html:
Ivan,
I like the new name as much as your articles.

Thanks for your dedication to enlighten the networking community.
comments.name: Mihalachioaie

comments.html: Excellent choice for the new name. Love your site and the range of topics you cover. I consider it required reading for any network administrator. Please keep it up!
